Kirks Original Coco Castile Shampoo - Imported (473 ml) Price: Rs.1900

Kirk's Original Coco Castile Shampoo 16 fl oz (473 ml). For over 165 years Kirk s Original Coco Castile Soap has bathed your family generation after generation with pure natural ingredients and exceptional performance. No Sodium lauryl Sulfate No Animal By-Products HypoallergenicHealthy Beautiful Skin Since 1839Kirk s Coco Castile Shampoo is a natural alternative to everyday shampoos. Crafted with natural cleansers from select Coconut Oil Kirk s Shampoo is ideal for all hair types. the luxurious lather rinses clean leaving no residue or build-up on your hair. 100% vegetable base. Hypoallergenic and biodegradable. Contains No Animal By-Products - Never Tested on Animals. Ideal for every member of the family. Try our complete line of Kirk s products: Bar Soap Shampoo Conditioner Liquid Soap1-800-82KIRKS. Made in the USA
